Cato-Neimoidia

string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: The homeworld of Princess Leia. Destroyed by the Death Star.
Home of the Trade Federation and their unique bridge cities.
A crystal planet, and the site of a fierce battle during the Clone Wars.
The entire planet is one huge city. Home of the Jedi Temple and later the capital of the Empire.
A planet strong with the Force, Yoda lives here in hiding as he trains Luke Skywalker.
The site on an abandonded Rebel base, the Empire thought it was too remote to serve as a test for the Death Star.
A forest moon, it was the site of a shield generator protecting the Second Death Star.
A jungle planet, it was the site of many battles during the Clone Wars.
Home of massive battle droid factories, this planet is where the Clone Wars began.
A frigid ice world, the Rebels established a base here until they were descovered by the Empire.
A barren and desolate planet, it was once the site of a huge battle. Only scavengers live here now. Everyone keeps trying to go back for some reason.
A forest planet, and the location of the droid attack on the Wookies.
Home to the proud and war-mongering Mandalorian people.
A fiery lava planet, this is where Anakin Skywalker turned to the Dark Side.
